text.text_translated:
Girox Foods should change how its managers lead. They should focus more on their people.
The company should give employees flexible work hours. Employees can choose their start and finish times. They can also choose their work location.
Managers should give staff interesting tasks. They should also recognize good work. They should tell employees when they do a good job.
The company should help employees learn new skills for their jobs. This training can help with communication skills. It can help employees talk with people from other cultures.
These changes will create a good work environment. Then, employees can do their best work.

best_attempt.text_translated:
We recommend changes to the management style at Girox Foods. The company should think more about its people.

Workers should have more flexible working hours. They should also be able to choose where they work.

Managers need to give their staff challenging work. They also need to show workers that they are doing a good job. This is positive recognition.

The company should spend more money on professional development. This is training to help employees improve their skills. This training should focus on communication. It can help people talk with others from different countries.

This will create a good environment for employees. Then they can produce their best work.
